    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4192</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Circuito in parallelo</string>
            <string language="en">Parallell curcuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parallell curcuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Curcuit de Parallell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curcuit de Parallell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Parallell curcuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curcuit de Parallell</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Sperimenta la tensione e la corrente elettrica in un circuito i cui elementi sono collegati in parallelo.</string>
            <string language="en">Explore the voltage and electrical current in a parallell curcuit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">parallelo</string>
            <string language="en">parallell</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie die Spannung und den elektrischen 
Strom in einem parallell curcuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorez la tension et le courant électrique dans
un curcuit de parallell.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explore a tensão e a corrente elétrica em um 
curcuit do parallell.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνήστε την τάση και το ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα σε ένα 
parallell curcuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explore el voltaje y la corriente eléctrica en 
un curcuit del parallell.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">parallell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">parallell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">parallell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">parallell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">parallell</string>
          </keyword>
